name: match_smoothing
description: Computes the smoothing sigma needed to be applied to structural data to match a given functional data smoothing level.

inputs.description: Path to the example functional image file.
inputs.name: Functional image file

inputs.description: Full-width at half maximum (FWHM) of the smoothing kernel applied to the functional data, in millimeters.
inputs.name: Functional smoothing FWHM

inputs.description: Path to the example structural image file.
inputs.name: Structural image file

inputs.description: Resolution of the standard space, in millimeters.
inputs.name: Standard space resolution
